title: Social Portal for Developers
description:
This website is built following an online course made by Brad Traversy. This is my github link to the codebase of the version I built.

Concepts used to build this site:

  • Building backend API with Node.js & Express
  • Protecting routes/endpoints with JWT
  • Extensive API testing with Postman
  • Integrating React with our backend in an elegant way
  • Building our frontend to work with the API
  • Using Redux for app state management
  • Create reducers and actions for resources
  • Create container components that integrate with Redux
  • Testing with the Redux Chrome extension
